name: Emperor Penguin
description:
O Emperor Penguin, the subjects of our Glorious Empire await your decisions in the consul room!

Unfortunately due to the sheer number of subjects lined up today, you will only have 10 seconds to accept or decline each penguin's request.

Each request will affect our Glorious Empire's resources: Food, Support, and Security.

If you are able to grow one of our resources to 10, your success will allow our Empire to enter a Golden Era! In contrast, letting one reach 0... Well I dare not speak of the consequences.

I understand our subjects do speak in… interesting ways. But if you fail to make a decision in 10 seconds, we will be forced to automatically decline their request.

Godspeed you! Penguin Emperor
